cab.content: his document is the property of His Britannic Majesty's Government. ST..253(30). CABINET. ARMISTICE DAY. Memorandum by the Home Secretary. Before separating for the Recess I should he glad if my colleagues would indicate whether they wish me again toundertake the duty of co-ordinating the arrangements forthe observance of Armistice Day, which will this year fallon a Tuesday. Last year's arrangements appeared to meet with general approval and I reconmend, subject to any viewsthat my colleagues may wish to offer, that this year'scelebration should follow the same lines. J.R.C.17th July, 1930.
